COOKING TIP

Meal prep is a key ingredient to artful cooking. Always set aside all equipment, utensils, ingredients and spices before you start cooking.

HEALTH TIP

Spice it up! Even eating just one meal with the compound capsaicin, commonly found in hot sauce, can reduce levels of the hunger-inducing hormone ghrelin.
